item.title: First Post
item.description: Hi! Thanks for reading this post. :D So, you made a website. Why? Because of a recent job search, there are several reasons I created this site: Proof: As a somewhat new technical writer (five years and counting!), this site serves as an example of what I am capable of. I dove headfirst into this career path knowing next to nothing about it, and I’ve come a long way. Ease of access: When courting prospective employers, it’s very convenient to provide on-demand examples of your work.
